SELECT A.ID ,A.MAIN_CATEGORY ,A.SMALL_CATEGORY ,A.AUTOINSERT ,A.SMALL_CATEGORY_NM ,A.USE_YN ,A.PART_DIV ,B.CODE_KO_NM AS PART_DIV_NM ,A.RGSTR_ID ,A.RGST_DT ,A.UPDTR_ID ,A.UPDT_DT
FROM TB_BA_SUB_CATEGORY A INNER JOIN TB_CM_CODE B ON B.GRP_CD = 'CAQPD' AND B.CODE_CD = A.PART_DIV

sql.if: AND (MAIN_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{criteria.mainCategory}||'%' OR SMALL_CATEGORY LIKE '%'||#{criteria.mainCategory}||'%' OR SMALL_CATEGORY_NM LIKE '%'||#{criteria.mainCategory}||'%')
